#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int n,l,m,r;
        cin >> n >> r >> m >> l;
        int rr = 9, ll = 9;
        while (rr > 0) {
            int d = (10000 * rr) + (1000 * r) + (100 * m) + (10 * l)+ ll;
            if (d%n == 0) {
                cout << rr << " " << ll << " " << d/n << endl;
                break;
            }
            else {
                ll--;
                if (ll < 0) {
                    ll = 9;
                    rr--;
                }
                if (rr == 0)
                    cout << "0" << endl;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
